title: Spring Dawn
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Hnn~, what great weather~. Perfect for taking a nap~. Ah, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Oh, what’s going on, Kanata-senpai? We have today off, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>But you’re here too, aren’t you, Kasumi-chan? Kanata came here to practice and enjoy a little nap in the clubroom~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>If you’re going to practice, do you want to do it together? Kasumin just finished running. Kasumin was thinking of doing dance practice after this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah.... or so Kanata would like to say, but the weather is too good. Why don’t we take juuuust a little bit of a nap~? The breeze feels so nice too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeeeh, but Kasumin is not sleepy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>They say, “In spring one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn”, you know? Anyone will get sleepy if you stay under the warm sunlight for a bit~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin wonders about that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, let me tell you the rest of the proverb. “In spring one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn. Chirping birds can be heard about. The sound of wind and rain rings overnight. Who knows how many petals have fallen throughout.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Zzz~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
